items.title: Canadian marine park threatens to euthanise 30 beluga whales
items.description: The Canadian government blocked Marineland's attempt to export the animals to a park in China.

items.title: Third person dies from methanol poisoning in Brazil
items.description: Authorities are investigating the source of the tainted drinks, which have affected more than 200 people.

items.title: Renewables overtake coal as world's biggest source of electricity
items.description: Developing countries lead the historic clean energy charge but the US and EU rely more on fossil fuels than before, a think tank study shows.

items.title: Army general named as Madagascar PM to quell Gen Z protests
items.description: Protesters have rejected the appointment and have demanded the president steps down within 48 hours.

items.title: Fifa accuses Malaysia of faking foreign-born players' eligibility
items.description: The alleged forgery was done to comply with Fifa's 'grandfather rule' for foreign-born players.
